message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000.  I believe it offers significant value at this price point, considering its worth to someone in your position.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's worth to me.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, $11,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider letting it go for $13,000.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'd be willing to go up to $12,500. Can you meet me halfway?
